ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:05:19 [Issue ID 4000-702298] urn:comicvine:4000-702298
ComicInfo.Summary:
After the departure of Janey Belle, a new Zombie Tramp has risen from the grave! Angel Lynch will debut in this issue as the next woman to take up the mantle of Zombie Tramp. Learn about her origin as she begins her journey of destruction in this oversized edition. Her all-new adventures will be written by creator Dan Mendoza and newcomer to the Danger Doll Universe, Vince Hernandez (writer of Aspen's Fathom and Artifact One).
Features regular and risqué variants from fan favorite series’ artists, including TMChu, with limited edition foil covers, and virgin lenticular covers featuring exclusive art from series creator Dan Mendoza showcasing the new Zombie Tramp, Angel Lynch, contrasted with the original Zombie Tramp, Janey Belle, in both regular and risqué editions!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Regular Cover | TMChu | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover | TMChu | 2 | C | Limited Edition Virgin Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Bill McKay | 3 | D | Limited Edition Virgin Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Bill McKay | 4 | E | Limited Edition Virgin Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 5 | F | Limited Edition Virgin Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Winston Young | 6 | G | Blank Sketch Cover, Limited to 2000 | None | 7 | H | Foil Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 8 | I | Risqué Foil Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 9 | J | Lenticular Virgin Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Dan Mendoza | 10 | K | Risqué Lenticular Virgin Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Dan Mendoza | 11 | Note: The digital edition (3/6/2019) for this issue was released before the print edition.
